    0. Experimental Protocol and Preprocessing 1. Multi-level Regression Models

    Foresee a next state

    foresee_next.Rd

    Get a predictive next position for a pedestrian (R function is used in testing. Another copy of C++ function runs the model fitting.)

    Usage

    foresee_next(x0, v, pt, t0 = 0)

    Arguments

    x0

    an initial (pedestrian) position

    v

    pedestrian walking speed

    pt

    how far in time a pedestrian can foresee what consequence its action may result

    t0

    how much time is needed to enact an action; assuming instantaneous when t0 = 0; this should map to t0.

    Details

    Function to get the predictive pedestrian state if beginning to cross. I assume a pedestrian prepares to walk to the north on the negative side of y axis.

    ## some examples
